import React from "react"; import styles from './styles/cabinetStyles.module.css' import deleteImg from '../../delete.png' import penImg from '../../pen.png' import userImg from "../../user.png"; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom'; const CabinetArticlePlate = ({user, article, deleteArticle}) => { return(

{article.title}

{article.content}

{article.creation_date}

); }; export default CabinetArticlePlate;
